org.cytoscape.cyGraph.centralities.api
Interface Centralities

public interface Centralities

Centralities provides access to a number of centrality measures for directed, undirected, weighted and unweighted network or graph.

Author:
Jimmy

Method Detail

computeAll

NetworkStatsResults computeAll(org.cytoscape.model.CyNetwork network,
                               boolean directed,
                               WeightFunction function)
Computes all the centrality measures.

Parameters:
network - The CyNetwork for which the user wants to compute centrality measures.
directed - True if the network is to be treated as directed and false otherwise.
function - WeightFunction mapping each edge to a weight.
Returns:

getBetweennessStress

java.util.Map<org.cytoscape.model.CyIdentifiable,java.util.List<java.lang.Double>> getBetweennessStress(org.cytoscape.model.CyNetwork network,
                                                                                                        boolean directed)
Computes node, edge betweenness and node stress and returns a Map from CyNode -> (Betweenness, Stress) and CyEdge -> (Betweenness)

Parameters:
network - The CyNetwork for which the user wants to compute node, edge betweenness and node stress.
directed - True if the network is to be treated as directed and false otherwise.
Returns:
Map of CyNode -> (Betweenness, Stress), CyEdge -> (Betweenness)

getCloseness

double getCloseness(org.cytoscape.model.CyNetwork network,
                    org.cytoscape.model.CyNode node,
                    boolean directed,
                    WeightFunction function)
Computes the closeness centrality of a given CyNode.

Parameters:
network - The CyNetwork containing the node for which the user wants to compute the closeness measure.
node - The CyNode for which the user wants to compute the closeness measure.
directed - True if the network is to be treated as directed and false otherwise.
function - WeightFunction mapping each edge to a weight.
Returns:
The closeness value of the node.

Parameters:

directed - True if the network is to be treated as directed and false otherwise.
Returns:
The clustering coefficient value of node.
